wasi-nn repo

Some discussion https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-nn/issues/6#issuecomment-731432728

WebAssembly/wasi-nn
Neural Network proposal for WASI. Contribute to WebAssembly/wasi-nn development by creating an account on GitHub.
Question: Will this design include online-learning / on-device-training spec 路 Issue #6 路 WebAssembly/wasi-nn
Hi there, I am wondering if this design will cover the on-device-training / capability of updating-param in the model. From my use case, it is kinda useful (and interesting) to enable the ability o...
